name: Zomblobs
description:
Online Multiplayer supported! Play with your friends as you defend your rocket from hordes of zomblobs, all while cooperatively collecting the right resources you need to expand your defenses.

Controls:

Spacebar to fire. 
E to pick up items.
F to consume fish to regain health points.
Left Click tower icon to enter tower placement mode, Left click to place
Right click to exit tower placement mode
